Articles.Content: Do you think that Ksp will release a online server in the near future? Please tell your opinion.

I hope not.

I'll refer you to the dozens of threads where multiplayer is thoroughly discussed and no agreement is ever found to take care of the handful of multiplayer game-breaking issues.
Not to mention the "wouldn't it be fun to send up a rocket retrograde and smash it into something?" issue...

Multiplayer...  the suggestion has some conceptual merit. But only within the modern context of gaming. Outside of that context, multiplayer KSP has much less merit. This includes both internet multiplayer and the older concept of LANparty multiplayer.

Though it does feel like it is being suggested by players who have known nothing but internet multiplayer games.
I highly doubt that Squad and Private Divison are A able to sustain a multiplayer sever B have enough staff to continually support it and C want to make it multiplayer.
Timewarp is one of the biggest reasons you can't do multiplayer. Everybody would want to be on a different time scale, so everybody would have to be at 1:1 and bored most of the time.
